attributes.action: Ban fireworks to protect our wildlife and pets!
attributes.additional_details: Every year we see people losing their pets, losing their best friends just so people can watch lights bang in the sky! Its never just for one day anymore, its the whole week! Imagine being so scared of something you have a heart attack and die, its real for our fur babies and its happening! This needs to stop, we also should be protecting our wildlife and not be causing potential harm or death.
attributes.background: Either ban fireworks, create silent ones or only sell them for one day for bonfire night and one day for new years, lets stop our pets and wildlife from dying and stop our retired troops reliving those gun shots!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559
